thread.title: Best Sonos deals: Play:3, Play:5, Playbar and more
thread.title_full: Best Sonos deals: Play:3, Play:5, Playbar and more

author: Andy Madden
title: Best Sonos deals: Play:3, Play:5, Playbar and more
text:
6th February 2017 by Andy Madden Follow @MandyAdden The best Sonos deals available, from the entry-level Play:1 speaker to the Playbar, plus Sonos system bundles and accessories. 
Sonos dominates the multi-room audio market with a wide range of wireless speaker solutions. Whether you want the entry-level Play:1 speaker, or the high-end Playbar soundbar (or both), Sonos' line-up is versatile enough to have plenty of appeal. 
Discounts can be hard to come by, but we've scoured the web in search of the finest. And even after the January sales have been and gone, there are still savings to be found. Let's take a look...
